channel.title: Comments on: Arduino FIO 2 Channel LCD Oscilloscope
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: FXavier
item.dc:creator: FXavier
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/08/02/arduino-fio-2-channel-lcd-oscilloscope/#comment-18450">George Tsafos</a>.
Hi George Tsafos. can i have the link of your project? Im willing to make this on 128x64 display. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
In reply to George Tsafos.

Hi George Tsafos. can i have the link of your project?
Im willing to make this on 128×64 display.
Thanks

item.title: By: Arduino FIO Graphical LCD Console – semifluid.com
item.dc:creator: Arduino FIO Graphical LCD Console – semifluid.com

item.title: By: George Tsafos
item.dc:creator: George Tsafos
item.description:
Thank you very much for sharing this. Nice work and very useful. I got it working on arduino uno on a cheap, no-name chinese LCD 128x64 screen (model: 12864zw) with literaly minor changes in your code. Modifications with your code were just to support my screen and some replacement strings for html special codes(copy+paste issue i guess :)).
In order to support the cheapo lcd 1264zw I've used the instructions given here: http://www.bajdi.com/cheap-128x64-graphic-lcd-12864zw/
Thanks a lot and if you want me I would be willing to post a video, pics and links ... just say so :)
item.content:encoded:
Thank you very much for sharing this. Nice work and very useful. I got it working on arduino uno on a cheap, no-name chinese LCD 128×64 screen (model: 12864zw) with literaly minor changes in your code. Modifications with your code were just to support my screen and some replacement strings for html special codes(copy+paste issue i guess :)).

In order to support the cheapo lcd 1264zw I’ve used the instructions given here:
http://www.bajdi.com/cheap-128×64-graphic-lcd-12864zw/

Thanks a lot and if you want me I would be willing to post a video, pics and links … just say so ðŸ™‚
